database.name: VIEW SCO_DOC_FOR_REGPLE_V
database.view: SELECT ss.sco_doc_for_regple_v_id, ss.ad_client_id, ss.ad_org_id, ss.isactive, ss.created, ss.createdby, ss.updated, ss.updatedby, ss.dateacct, ss.c_period_id, ss.shortperiod, ss.regnumber, ss.correlnumber, ss.record1, ss.ad_table_id, ss.areaid, to_char((are.areacode || '-') || are.areaname) AS areaname, to_char('A') AS btnshowdetails, ss.typefactacct, to_char('B') AS btndeletedetails, to_char('C') AS btnredirectdocrel FROM (SELECT min(fa.fact_acct_id) AS sco_doc_for_regple_v_id, fa.ad_client_id, fa.ad_org_id, fa.isactive, to_date('10-07-2018') AS created, to_char('100') AS createdby, to_date('16-07-2018') AS updated, to_char('100') AS updatedby, fa.dateacct, fa.c_period_id, to_char(fa.dateacct, 'MM-yyyy') AS shortperiod, fa.em_sco_regnumber AS regnumber, fa.em_sco_correlnum AS correlnumber, fa.record_id AS record1, fa.ad_table_id, fa.em_sco_area_id AS areaid, to_char('NO_REGULARIZADO') AS typefactacct FROM fact_acct fa GROUP BY fa.ad_client_id, fa.ad_org_id, fa.isactive, fa.dateacct, fa.c_period_id, fa.em_sco_regnumber, fa.em_sco_correlnum, fa.record_id, fa.ad_table_id, fa.em_sco_area_id UNION SELECT max(fa.sco_ple5_6_reg_id) AS sco_doc_for_regple_v_id, fa.ad_client_id, fa.ad_org_id, fa.isactive, to_date('10-07-2018') AS created, to_char('100') AS createdby, to_date('16-07-2018') AS updated, to_char('100') AS updatedby, fa.dateacct, fa.reg56_period_id AS c_period_id, to_char(per.startdate, 'MM-yyyy') AS shortperiod, fa.sco_regnumber AS regnumber, fa.sco_correlnum AS correlnumber, fa.record_id AS record1, fa.ad_table_id, fa.sco_area_id AS areaid, to_char('REGULARIZADO') AS typefactacct FROM sco_ple5_6_reg fa JOIN c_period per ON fa.reg56_period_id = per.c_period_id GROUP BY fa.ad_client_id, fa.ad_org_id, fa.isactive, fa.dateacct, fa.reg56_period_id, fa.sco_regnumber, fa.sco_correlnum, fa.record_id, fa.ad_table_id, fa.sco_area_id, per.startdate ORDER BY 9 DESC) ss LEFT JOIN sco_area are ON ss.areaid = are.sco_area_id ORDER BY ss.dateacct DESC, ss.regnumber DESC, ss.correlnumber DESC
